sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SEC_METADATA_LOG ( LOG_ID , METADATA_ID , HOST_NAME , CLIENT_IP , FILE_NAME , BACKUP_FILE_NAME , SUFFIX , PREFIX , OPERATION_DATE , OPERATOR , RESULT , OPERATION ) VALUES (#logId# , #metadataId:VARCHAR# , #hostName:VARCHAR# , #clientIp:VARCHAR# , #fileName:VARCHAR# , #backupFileName:VARCHAR#, #suffix:VARCHAR# , #prefix:VARCHAR# , SYSDATE , #operator:VARCHAR# , #result:VARCHAR# , #operation:VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SEC_METADATA_LOG SET OPERATION = #operation#, OPERATION_DATE = SYSDATE , RESULT = #result# WHERE LOG_ID = #logId#
